name: UpdatePullRequest
description:
Update an existing pull request on GitHub.

Use this tool to update an existing pull request in a GitHub repository. This can be used when you need to modify the details of a pull request, such as its title, body, or state. Requires write access to the source branch or membership in the owning organization.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository to update the pull request in. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the pull request.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: target_base_branch
parameters.description: The name of the branch where changes should be pulled into. Must be an existing branch on the current repository.

value_schema.description: The name of the branch you want your changes pulled into. This should be an existing branch on the current repository. You cannot update the base branch on a pull request to point to another repository.

parameters.name: pull_request_body
parameters.description: Provide the updated content or description for the pull request.

value_schema.description: The contents of the pull request.

parameters.name: pull_request_state
parameters.description: Specifies whether the pull request should be 'open' or 'closed'.

value_schema.description: State of this Pull Request. Either `open` or `closed`.

parameters.name: pull_request_title
parameters.description: The new title for the pull request. Use this to update the PR title.

value_schema.description: The title of the pull request.

parameters.name: maintainers_can_modify
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether maintainers can modify the pull request.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether [maintainers can modify](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/articles/allowing-changes-to-a-pull-request-branch-created-from-a-fork/) the pull request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The name of the branch you want your changes pulled into. This should be an existing branch on the current repository. You cannot update the base branch on a pull request to point to another repository.

value_schema.description: The name of the branch you want your changes pulled into. This should be an existing branch on the current repository. You cannot update the base branch on a pull request to point to another repository.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The contents of the pull request.

value_schema.description: The contents of the pull request.

parameters.name: maintainer_can_modify
parameters.description: Indicates whether [maintainers can modify](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/articles/allowing-changes-to-a-pull-request-branch-created-from-a-fork/) the pull request.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether [maintainers can modify](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/articles/allowing-changes-to-a-pull-request-branch-created-from-a-fork/) the pull request.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State of this Pull Request. Either `open` or `closed`.

value_schema.description: State of this Pull Request. Either `open` or `closed`.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the pull request.

value_schema.description: The title of the pull request.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
